Macros

#define DMA_EINVAL   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_DMA_BASE-1)
 Error Code: Invalid argument.
 
#define DMA_ENOINIT   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_DMA_BASE-2)
 Error Code: Operation cannot be done as DMA_init is not done.
 
#define DMA_EOUTOFRANGE   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_DMA_BASE-3)
 Error Code: input argument out of range.
 
#define DMA_EOUTOFMEM   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_DMA_BASE-4)
 Error Code: input argument out of range.
 
#define DMA_ENOTSUPP   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_DMA_BASE-5)
 Error Code: feature not supported.
 
#define DMA_EINUSE   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_DMA_BASE-6)
 Error Code: channel or resource in use.
 
#define DMA_ENOTALIGNED   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_DMA_BASE-7)
 Error Code: channel or resource in use.
 
#define DMA_EPOLLINGNOTALLOWED   (MMWAVE_ERRNO_DMA_BASE-8)
 Error Code: Polling and Interrupts are mutually exclusive.
 
#define DMA_CHANNEL_NONE   0xFFU
 Define for an unspecified channel.

uint32_t DMA_assignChannel (DMA_Handle handle, uint32_t channel, uint32_t reqline, int32_t *errCode)
 Function to assign DMA request lines to channels. This should be used only if the channel is meant for H/W triggering. For S/W triggered channel, ignore this API. More...
 
int32_t DMA_freeChannel (DMA_Handle handle, uint32_t channel, uint32_t reqline)
 Function to remove the DMA request lines to channel mapping and free the channel for another assignment. More...
 
int32_t DMA_enableInterrupt (DMA_Handle handle, uint32_t channel, DMA_IntType intType, DMA_IntHandlerFuncPTR callbackFn, void *callbackArg)
 Function to enable a given interrupt type for a given channel. More...
 
int32_t DMA_disableInterrupt (DMA_Handle handle, uint32_t channel, DMA_IntType intType)
 Function to disable a given interrupt type for a given channel. More...
 
int32_t DMA_setChannelParams (DMA_Handle handle, uint32_t channel, DMA_CtrlPktParams *ctrlPacket)
 Function to set the control packet RAM for a given channel. More...

 Function to enable the channel given the trigger type. More...
 
int32_t DMA_disableChannel (DMA_Handle handle, uint32_t channel, DMA_ChTriggerType triggerType)
 Function to disable the channel given the trigger type. More...

 Function to get the channel status. More...
 
int32_t DMA_getStatus (DMA_Handle handle, uint32_t channel, DMA_Status *pDmaStatus)
 Function to get the DMA peripheral status. More...
 
uint32_t DMA_getChannelInterruptFlag (DMA_Handle handle, uint32_t channel, DMA_IntType intType, int32_t *errCode)
 Function to get the DMA channel completion status based on interrupt type. This API can be used for polling channel transfer completion when interrupts are not enabled for that channel by using FTC or BTC as the intType. More...
 
int32_t DMA_clearChannelInterruptFlag (DMA_Handle handle, uint32_t channel, DMA_IntType intType)
 Function to clear the DMA channel completion status based on interrupt type. This API should be called before triggering the channel and using DMA_getChannelInterruptFlag() for polling. More...
